name: Py Games
description:
Our inspiration for this project was from the highly successful Netflix show: Squid Games.

It is a series of challenges (minigames) that vary in difficulty.

We used Python's PyGame to develop this game (which is also where the name of the projects inspiration came from).

Time was the only thing we struggled with which is why we decided not to make it so graphical, but functional instead.

We are both proud of trying new skills and pushing ourselves to work hard on a project like this.

We have learnt time management and new tricks to make modular coding simpler.

We may decide to develop this further and increase the level of graphics available.
